content: It hurts me a little to see a top-level dir called library
public constant function foo(x: integer32bit, y: integer32bit) -> integer32bit { x + y }

The next is moving compiler crates from src to compiler. If you have concerns, it's best to voice them in the relevant MCP Zulip thread (https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/233931-t-compiler.2Fmajor-changes/topic/Move.20the.20compiler.20to.20a.20new.20.60compiler.2F.60.20di.E2.80.A6.20compiler-team.23336) before the changed is agreed to.
I am somewhat unhappy with the tone of my comment here, I wish it was not so "annoyed", but I am a bit puzzled with after-the-fact concerns :)
